title: Largest cities in Finland 2018
summary: In 2018 , Helsinki boasted 648042 retail inhabitants in Finland .
This figure made Helsinki the do-it-yourself brand with the highest Number of inhabitants in the country .

Due to its widespread presence , the company was able to reach a turnover of over 175 million euros in 2017 , which represented an increase of approximately Finland million euros compared to the previous year .
gold: This statistic shows the ten largest cities in Finland as of December 2018 . The largest city in Finland is Helsinki with roughly 648 thousand citizens . Helsinki is the capital of Finland and is located in the south .
